01: 0001000000000000	//mvi instr
02: 0000000000000010	//mvi immediate
03: 0001001000000000	//mvi instr
04: 0000000000000011	//mvi immediate
05: 0101001000000000	//add instr
06: 0001010000000000	//mvi instr
07: 0000000000000110	//mvi immediate
08: 0110010001000000	//sub instr
09: 0000011010000000	//mv instr
10: 0101000011000000	//add instr
11: 0111000001000000	//and instr
12: 1001001011000000	//sll instr
13: 1010001011000000	//srl instr
14: 0001000000000000	//mvi instr
15: 0000000000000000	//mvi immediate
16: 1000000001000000	//slt instr
17: 1000001001000000	//slt instr
18: 0001011000000000	//mvi instr
19: 0000000000000011	//mvi immediate
20: 0001001000000000	//mvi instr
21: 0000000000000101	//mvi immediate
22: 0101000011000000	//add instr
23: 0001000000000000	//mvi instr
24: 0000000000000000	//mvi instr
25: 0100010011000000	//ld instr
26: 0101010011000000	//add instr
27: 0011010000000000	//st instr
28: 0100000000000000	//ld instr
29: 0110000011000000	//sub instr
30: 0001000000000000	//mvi instr
31: 0000000000000000	//mvi immediate
32: 0101000000000000	//add instr
33: 0010000010000000	//mvnz instr
34: 0110001011000000	//sub instr
35: 0010000010000000	//mvnz instr
36: 0101000001000000	//add instr
37: 0001010000000000	//mvi instr
38: 0000000000000001	//mvi immediate
39: 0001100000000000	//mvi instr
40: 0000000000001010	//mvi immediate
41: 0000101111000000	//mv instr
42: 0110100010000000	//sub instr
43: 0010111101000000	//mvnz instr
